about.title: About
about.subtitle: Let's get to know each other

part1.title: Who we are
part1.content1: LionSkins was made by gamers and for gamers.
part1.content2: The purpose of our service is to provide easy access to trusted marketplaces for you to buy the skins of your dreams for your favorite video games at the best price available.
part1.content3: We are not affiliated to any of the marketplaces we suggest, we just consider them to be trustworthy.
part1.content4: If you have any question, don't hesite to drop us a message from the <1>contact form</1>!

changelog.title: What's new on LionSkins:
changelog.2019_10_20_001: The new Classic Knife was added
changelog.2019_10_21_001: Now you can check out prices for the glove skins!
changelog.2019_11_19_001: New knives from the Shattered Web collection were added
changelog.2020_05_09_001: Prices from the CS.Money platform are now available!
changelog.2020_05_22_001: Visualize the skins you own and evaluate the price of your Steam inventory!

inventory.page_title: LionSkins - Your Counter-Strike: Gobal Offensive inventory
inventory.title: Your inventory
inventory.sign_in_subtitle: Log in with your Steam account to evaluate your inventory!
inventory.no_results_subtitle: No skin was found in your inventory. Make sure the visibility of your inventory is set to public on the confidentiality settings of your Steam account!
inventory.summary_title: this is the current value of your inventory
inventory.summary_subtitle: This is the  minimum resale price for all of the skins in your inventory, although some stickers may increase their value. None of the prices shown on this page include the platform fee, usually between 5 and 30%, applied by the marketplace in case of a successful sale.

part1.title: Why only Counter-Strike?
part1.content: We wanted to add more games at first, but we never had neither time nor resources to do so... But we keep that in mind for one day maybe!

part2.title: Why don't you propose this one marketplace?
part2.content: We're sure that this service is super great, but we cannot include every marketplace that exists. But maybe if you are numerous enough to suggest this, we'll have a look one day or another!

part3.title: The price you showed was not right!
part3.content: Even though we aim for real-time pricing updates, we are technically not able to do so at the moment; which is why you may notice inconsistencies between the prices we show and the effective prices in the marketplaces.

part4.title: Are you affiliated with this or that marketplace?
part4.content: No, we're not, LionSkins is independent. However, the Bitskins links are affiliated, and we perceive 1% on your very first order on this marketplace if you use one of our links.

part5.title: Can I suggest you something?
part5.content: We'd love to hear about your ideas so that we make LionSkins better! Drop us a message from the <1>contact form</1>.

part1.title: Who we are
part1.content1: LionSkins was made by gamers and for gamers. We are pleased to see you use our service, and you can be sure that we wil never use any of your personal data for profit or for anything that does not involve a better user experience.
part1.content2: If you have any question regarding this privacy policy, feel free to <1>contact us</1>.

item1.name: Your Steam ID and username
item1.description: : only if you choose to sign up through Steam on our service

item2.name: Your e-mail address
item2.description: : only if you want to contact us from the contact form and expect an answer

item3.name: Your clicks on links to marketplaces' websites
item3.description: : everytime you click on one of the links that redirects you to a skin marketplace, we generate a unique and totally random id in order to have a rough idea of how our visitors interact with the marketplaces we suggest. This id is automatically deleted at the end of your visit, and cannot be linked back to your device or your person

part3.title: Third party services we use
part3.content1: We also use third-party services to make our site work like we want it to. Here's the list:

item1.name: Steam
item1.description: : Valve's well-known digital video game store. We use their OpenID service to authenticate users on our side

item2.name: Matomo
item2.description: : an open-source analytics platform that is known for being especially privacy-protection friendly. We need this tool to know how our visitors interact with our service in order to continuously improve their experience

item3.name: Recaptcha
item3.description: : Google's captcha solution. This is only used on the contact form to prevent spam

no_results.title: No results
no_results.subtitle: We didn't find anything matching your criteria
